00014 void on_accept(int fd, short ev, void *arg){
00015         int client_fd, err_len;
00016     char *err, *err_log;
00017         struct sockaddr_in client_addr;
00018         socklen_t client_len;
00019     LIBEVENT_WORK_THREAD *thread;
00020     client_len = sizeof(client_addr);
00021     uint64_t u;
00022     ssize_t s;
00023     extern NOTIFY_TOKEN_STATE notify_token_thread;
00024     extern int token_efd;
00025         
00026         /* Accept the new connection. */
00027         client_fd = accept(fd, (struct sockaddr *)&client_addr, &client_len);
00028         if (client_fd == -1) {
00029         err = strerror(errno);
00030         err_len = strlen(err);
00031         err_log = calloc(1, err_len+10);
00032         sprintf(err_log, "accept-- %s", err);
00033                 d_log(err_log);
00034         free(err_log);
00035                 return;
00036         }
00037     if(rq_push(client_fd) == 0){
00038         if(notify_token_thread == NT_FREE){
00039             /*  thread = work_threads+1;
00040               write(thread->notify_write_fd, "", 1);       
00041                  token_sem_post();*/
00042              u = 1;
00043              s = write(token_efd, &u , sizeof(uint64_t));
00044 
00045              if(s != sizeof(uint64_t))printf("error---\n");
00046  
00047         }else{
00048             printf("accept error\n");
00049         }
00050 
00051         
00052 
00053     }else{
00054         close(client_fd);
00055         d_log("RQ is full");
00056     }
00057 
00058     if(proc_status == NT_FREE){
00059         procThread();
00060     }
00061 }
00062 
00063 void conn_new(int sfd, struct event_base *base){
00064         conns = (conn *)calloc(1, sizeof(conn));
00065         conns->sfd = sfd;
00066 
00067         event_set(&conns->event, sfd, EV_READ|EV_PERSIST, on_accept, (void *)conns);
00068         event_base_set(base, &conns->event);
00069         event_add(&conns->event, 0);
00070 
00071 }

00077  *  Description:

00079  */
00080 void procThread (  ){
00081     pthread_t       thread;
00082     pthread_attr_t  attr;
00083     int ret;
00084     pthread_attr_init(&attr);
00085     
00086     proc_status = NT_HAS;
00087             
00088     if ((ret = pthread_create(&thread, &attr, fproc, NULL)) != 0) {
00089         d_log("Can't create thread");
00090         printf("here---\n");
00091         exit(1);
00092     }   
00093 }               /* -----  end of function procThread  ----- */

00096 /* 
00097  * ===  FUNCTION  ======================================================================
00098  *         Name:  fproc
00099  *  Description:  
00100  * =====================================================================================
00101  */
00102 void *fproc ( void *arg){
00103     proc_status = NT_WORKING;
00104     hproc();
00105     proc_status = NT_FREE;
00106 }               /* -----  end of function fproc  ----- */
